channel.title: New in game class bringing in the medieval baron and bandit to the fold
channel.description:
# **[color=#0000FF]Baron[/color]** - Support
**Night ability 1:** Harvest (only when Reinforce is out of charge) Tonight you will harvest your crops to give your troops strength (adds charge to Reinforce)
**Night Ability 2:** Send Troops (unlimited) Send your troops to protect a player from attacks (prevented)
**Day Ability 1:** Reinforce (max 1 can be stored) Tonight send troops will prevent all visits and occupy any that try to visit
# **[color=#551A8B]Bandit[/color]** - Offencsive
**Night Ability 1:** Suicidal Army (1 use) Send your troops to kill your target bypassing Immunity
**Night Ability 2** Ambush (unlimited) Occupy a player while making them look guilty to investigators **add on:** if a observer watches then it will state they visited a target that died or that the person is unseen if a sheriff visits they will show as unseen
**Day Ability 1:** Self suicide (1 use) Choose a player to kill tonight bypasses immunity you will also die the same night **Add on:** If you get lynched the same day as choosing self suicide you will suicide yourself off the stand to kill your target before your own execution. If your target is the reaper you will take 2 souls away from the reaper and they will die as anyone else before your own execution, if the reaper has enough souls remaining only the reaper will know they were attacked and no animation will take place.
Even if this didn't get implemented i would like to see boslof bring in a baron and bandit from the medieval times into throne of lies

item.title: New in game class bringing in the medieval baron and bandit to the fold
item.dc:creator: Ami
item.description:
PandaPete:

Night Ability 2: Send Troops (unlimited)

Send your troops to protect a player from attacks

This is just OP AF. Unlimited guard.

PandaPete:

Day Ability 1: Reinforce (max 1 can be stored)

Tonight send troops will prevent all visits and occupy any that try to visit

Stand guard that can be recharged.

PandaPete:

Offencsive

Kek

PandaPete:

Night Ability 1: Suicidal Army (1 use)

Send your troops to kill your target bypassing Immunity

Should not pierce immunity, but otherwise okay.

PandaPete:

Night Ability 2 Ambush (unlimited)

Occupy a player while making them look guilty to investigators

No complaints from me here

PandaPete:

Day Ability 1: Self suicide (1 use)

Choose a player to kill tonight bypasses immunity you will also die the same nigh

This to me seems like the Old Cult killing system.

Read full topic
